REUTERS.UNKNOWN: A RM f1947 reute r f BC-WESTERN-DIGITAL-<WDC> 04-08 0051

TEXT.TITLE: WESTERN DIGITAL <WDC> REDEEMS DEBT
TEXT.BODY: Western Digital Corp said it has completed the redemption of its 47 mln dlrs of 6-3/4 pct convertible subordinated debentures due 2011. The debt was surrendered for conversion into comon stock, resulting in 2,685,142 shares being issued. Reuter
